definition: To establish clear boundaries or limits between different entities or concepts, often used in the context of distinguishing or separating one thing from another.

examples.german: Ich möchte mich von meiner Familie abgrenzen.
examples.english: I want to distance myself from my family.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, klare Grenzen abzugrenzen.
examples.english: It is important to set clear boundaries.

examples.german: Der Zaun grenzt das Grundstück ab.
examples.english: The fence marks off the property.

examples.german: Sie muss ihre persönlichen Bedürfnisse von den beruflichen abgrenzen.
examples.english: She needs to separate her personal needs from her professional ones.

examples.german: Die Politikerin versucht, sich von den anderen Kandidaten abzugrenzen.
examples.english: The politician is trying to differentiate herself from the other candidates.
